title: Quarkiverse template: `Quarkus - ` should be `Quarkus ` in antora.tpl.qute.yml
body:
AFAIK, we refer to Quarkiverse extensions as `Quarkus XXX`. It was the case for most of them here https://quarkiverse.github.io/quarkiverse-docs/index/index/index.html but I think, while fixing the namespace for another place, we somehow added the dash to the antora playbook too.

I don't know what would be the best way to fix it, either introduce another variable or use Qute to remove the ` -` suffix.

/cc @ia3andy
